verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H569>Amraphel<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar,<s%> <S%H746>Arioch<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H495>Ellasar,<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and <S%H8413>Tidal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1471>nations;<s%>

That these <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H1298>Bera<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H1306>Birsha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> <S%H8134>Shinab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H126>Admah,<s%> and <S%H8038>Shemeber<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6636>Zeboiim,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H6820>Zoar.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were joined <S%H2266>together<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

Twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer,<s%> and in the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> they <S%H4775>rebelled.<s%>

And in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer,<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7497>Rephaims<s%> in Ashteroth <S%H6255>Karnaim,<s%> and the <S%H2104>Zuzims<s%> in <S%H1990>Ham,<s%> and the <S%H368>Emims<s%> in Shaveh <S%H7741>Kiriathaim,<s%>
And the <S%H2752>Horites<s%> in their <S%H2042>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H364>El-paran,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And they <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H5880>En-mishpat,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6003>Amalekites,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2688>Hazezon-tamar.<s%>

And there went <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H126>Admah,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6636>Zeboiim,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> (the <S%H1931>same<s%> is <S%H6820>Zoar)<s%> and they <S%H6186>joined<s%> <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them in the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim;<s%>

With <S%H854><s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and with <S%H8413>Tidal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H569>Amraphel<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar,<s%> and <S%H746>Arioch<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H495>Ellasar;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H2568>five.<s%>

And the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim<s%> was full of slime <S%H875>pits;<s%> <S%H875><s%> <S%H2564><s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> and they that <S%H7604>remained<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7399>goods<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H400>victuals,<s%> and went their <S%H1980>way.<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and his <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and <S%H1980>departed.<s%>

And there <S%H935>came<s%> one that had <S%H6412>escaped,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> the <S%H5680>Hebrew;<s%> for <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H4471>Mamre<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H6063>Aner:<s%> and <S%H1992>these<s%> were <S%H1167>confederate<s%> <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H87>Abram.<s%>

And when <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> was taken <S%H7617>captive,<s%> he <S%H7324>armed<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2593>trained<s%> servants, <S%H3211>born<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8083>eighteen,<s%> <S%H6240><s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>

And he divided <S%H2505>himself<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, <S%H1931>he<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2327>Hobah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the left <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H8040><s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%>

And he brought <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> brought <S%H7725>again<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> and his <S%H7399>goods,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H7725>return<s%> from the <S%H4480>slaughter<s%> <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853>of<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer,<s%> and of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him, <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7740>Shaveh,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6010>dale.<s%>

And <S%H4442>Melchizedek<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8004>Salem<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine:<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> was the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of the most <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H87>Abram<s%> of the most <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H7069>possessor<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and earth: <S%H776><s%>

And <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be the most <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> hath <S%H4042>delivered<s%> thine <S%H6862>enemies<s%> into thy <S%H3027>hand.<s%> And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of <S%H4480>all.<s%> <S%H3605><s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> me the <S%H5315>persons,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H7399>goods<s%> to thyself.

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> I have lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the most <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> the <S%H7069>possessor<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%>

That I will <S%H518>not<s%> take from a <S%H4480>thread<s%> <S%H2339><s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> a <S%H8288>shoelatchet,<s%> <S%H5275><s%> and that I will <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> any <S%H4480>thing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is thine, <S%H3808>lest<s%> thou shouldest <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> have made Abram <S%H6238>rich:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H87><s%>

Save <S%H1107><s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> the young <S%H5288>men<s%> have <S%H398>eaten,<s%> and the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me, <S%H6063>Aner,<s%> <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and <S%H4471>Mamre;<s%> let <S%H1992>them<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H2506>portion.<s%>
